articles.title: Sam Elliott slams Kiwi director Jane Campion over Power of the Dog: 'Piece of s***' - New Zealand Herald
articles.description: 'What the f*** does this woman from New Zealand know about the American West?'
articles.content: Watch: The Power of the Dog trailer. Video / NetflixActor Sam Elliott is known as a veteran of Western films - and he had something to say about Kiwi director Jane Campion's take on the genre set in … [+2003 chars]

articles.title: Europe's joint Mars mission with Russia postponed by war - 1News
articles.description: While Europe has its own rockets to put satellites into orbit, it relies on Russian and American partners to send astronauts into space.
articles.content:
The launch of a joint Europe-Russia mission to Mars this year is now very unlikely due to sanctions linked to the war in Ukraine, the European Space Agency said on Tuesday.

articles.title: Bengaluru astronomers claim to disprove findings on first stars formed after Big Bang - Deccan Herald
